constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 46 (Thursday, March 11, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. AMODEI:
H.R. 1789.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clause 5--To coin Money, regulate the
Value thereof, and of foreign coin, and fix the standard of
Weights and Measures;
[Page H1356]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Committee on Financial Services, and in addition to the Committees on the Budget, and Rules, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

title: Coin Metal Modification Authorization and Cost Savings Act of 2021
